question:
You have learned about an international job that is available within the company you currently work for and you want to apply.
 
Write a letter to the hiring manager. In your letter
 
 
Say why you are applying for this international position
 
Describe the job you are currently doing for the company
 
Tell him/her why you think you will be good at the job
 
 
Begin your letter as follows: Dear Sir or Madam
text: I am writing to express my interest in the post of clinical research associate for the launch of a new drug delivery system in Canada. Ideally, I would like to let you know that I am willing to build a better understanding of foreign culture, which helps me to develop my practical skills. Therefore, it would be advantageous for my career.

In detail, I Hadiqa Zia, am working as a research associate at Aga Khan University for the past three years. Additionally, I have completed my clinical research course at the University of Toronto. The reason why I am seeking this international position is that it is advantageous for my professional growth.

Furthermore, I feel that I would be suitable for this job due to a plethora of reasons. Firstly, I had recently received an excellence award in the field of research by the government of Pakistan. Not only have I gained excellent communication skills but I can build relationships easily.
My resume is attached for your consideration.
Hoping for a swift response to my concerns.
